posts.caption:
This week, NVDA surpassed Apple as the 2nd MOST VALUABLE Company in the US and they did so by surpassing the $3 TRILLION market cap level.

Before long we will see NVDA surpass MSFT as the Top most valuable company in the US based on its growth trajectory.

How long before NVDA becomes the MOST VALUABLE company in the US?

Dividend stocks come in all shapes and sizes. Lower yield usually comes with faster dividend growth whereas higher yield is usually more mature and stable companies.

Do you prefer more stability or dividend growth?

Warren Buffett is known as being the GOAT of investing.

He has shown the importance of diversification, but more importantly the importance of PATIENCE. Doing your due diligence to determine whether a stock is OVERvalued or UNDERvalued is so important.

Wait to buy at a price you are comfortable buying at, do not chase stocks at bad valuations.

Do you invest based on Fundamentals. If you are interested in learning more, consider working with me 1 on 1 for my 6-week Investing Accelerator course. Go to https://go.roussinfinancial.com/evaluation

Have you been buying the dip on NVDA? When high quality stocks drop, long term investors should be looking to pounce.

Valuation matters and when stocks get overvalued, they fall, which is what we have been seeing in the technology sector, but NVDA has some major growth in store the next few years…still.

I LOVE Dividends. But, more important than that…I love companies that continuously INCREASE their dividend year in and year out.

These 12 stocks have all INCREASED their dividend in the month of July. Some much faster than others, but an increase nonetheless. Increased dividends put the Power of Compounding Dividends into overdrive.

Do you own any of these stocks?

Shares of SBUX are down more than 40% from their All-Time highs.

New management took over about a year ago, and they have not proven much to investors but again, it has only been a year. The fact of the matter is that people are addicted to the product and looking out years from now I believe more people will be drinking coffee. 

The valuation is cheap, but you have to be willing to wait for the turnaround. China is the company’s 2nd largest market and when that economy gets going it will help turn things around. 

Are you buying shares of SBUX at these levels?

Many of the Mag7 stocks have a boat load of cash, billions of dollars of cash ready to be deployed.

However, Warren Buffett & Co over at $BRK.B have even more with nearly $190 Billion in cash. Berkshire does not pay a dividend but it buys back stock aggressively. 

In the meantime, are they waiting for an opportunity to acquire a company? We will have to see.

Companies that have to cut their dividends are usually ones that you want to stay away from, not always but generally.

Companies have to cut their dividends usually when they do not have the free cash flow to pay them, pay down their debt and reinvest.

these are 12 companies that have cut their dividends . Do you currently own any of these 12 companies?

When it comes to investing, I tend to focus on quality first and foremost. One of the most important things I focus on when analyzing a company is how efficient the company is ran. How strong on their profit margins?

Companies that are efficient and have higher profit margins tend to generate more cash and companies with more cash have the ability to pay a dividend consistently and grow that dividend. 

In this image, you will see these companies profit margins along with their five-year dividend growth rate.

How many companies on this list do you own?

Alphabet aka Google now has a market cap that is larger than the German Stock market as whole. That is wild to think of how large some of these mega cap stocks have become.

For those of you that follow my portfolio on my newsletter The Stock Investor’s Edge (link in bio) you will know that GOOGL is my largest individual stock position.

Are you BULLISH or BEARISH on shares of GOOGL over the next 12mo?
